Datawise is a new start-up in the field of analysis of GeoSpatial data.
We analyse the GPS data obtained mostly from mobile data providers (e.g. Docomo) and derive marketing insights from this data.
As a Data Scientist at Datawise, my job is primarily to analyse GPS data and build statistical models (e.g. to predict age/gender based on GPS trajectory).
Since Datawise is a small company, I also have experience in Data Engineering of a big data (using GCP Bigquery and GCP Composer) and also developing back-end for our data analysis service.
